brand.tagline: MINDRA — your warm AI friend & coach
hero.title: Support, motivation and habit tracking — in one bot and on the web
hero.subtitle: Mindra helps you talk about what matters, stay focused on goals, and take care of yourself. Use it in Telegram or directly on our website. Works in 11 languages.
features.title: What Mindra can do
features.cards.chat.title: Supportive dialogue
features.cards.chat.text: Warm, gentle replies — without judgment or pressure.
features.cards.coach.title: Motivation & coaching
features.cards.coach.text: Action plans, micro-steps, and regular check-ins.
features.cards.goals.title: Goals & habits
features.cards.goals.text: Add goals, track habits, and get reminders.
features.cards.reports.title: Reports & stats
features.cards.reports.text: Weekly summaries, points and streaks for progress.
features.cards.voice.title: Voice responses
features.cards.voice.text: Multiple voices (incl. ElevenLabs) and sleep sounds.
features.cards.premium.title: Premium challenges
features.cards.premium.text: Weekly challenges, pins, and auto-completion tracking.
support.title: Why support matters
support.intro: Mindra is growing to gently support people and help with goals and habits. Any contribution speeds up development, localization and new features.
support.goal.title: Funding goal — Mindra App
support.goal.text: We’re building the Mindra mobile app. Key features at launch:
support.features.1: Face-to-face video calls with Mindra — pick an appearance and talk.
support.features.2: All Telegram-bot features in one place: chat, goals, habits, reports.
support.features.3: 11 languages, friendly UI, and a basis for future offline mode.
support.desc: Contact us by email or Telegram. We reply as soon as possible.
